name: Python Practice Environment
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip python3-venv && python3 -m venv /workspace/.venv && echo 'source /workspace/.venv/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc && /workspace/.venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && /workspace/.venv/bin/pip install pytest==8.3.4 && echo 'Python environment ready!'
